an3.10:1.1: “Anyone who has three qualities, and has not given up three stains, is cast down to hell.
an3.10:1.3: They’re unethical, and haven’t given up the stain of immorality.
an3.10:1.4: They’re jealous, and haven’t given up the stain of jealousy.
an3.10:1.5: They’re stingy, and haven’t given up the stain of stinginess.
an3.10:1.6: Anyone who has these three qualities, and has not given up these three stains, is cast down to hell.
an3.10:2.1: Anyone who has three qualities, and has given up three stains, is raised up to heaven.
an3.10:2.3: They’re ethical, and have given up the stain of immorality.
an3.10:2.4: They’re not jealous, and have given up the stain of jealousy.
an3.10:2.5: They’re not stingy, and have given up the stain of stinginess.
an3.10:2.6: Anyone who has these three qualities, and has given up these three stains, is raised up to heaven.”
